WItem.en-US: Log In error. Please try again.
WItem.zh-TW: 登錄時發生錯誤, 請重新輸入.

WItem.en-US: Once you switch accounts, all the original files saved by the prior account can’t be remotely accessed from this computer. Also, devices using your prior account won't upload original files to your Waveface Station.
WItem.zh-TW: 切換使用者帳號後，您上一個帳號內所有的原始檔案將無法被遠端存取。並且，如您其它裝置上使用的是上一個帳號，則存放內容之原始檔案，將不會自動備份至此台電腦上。

WItem.en-US: User '{0}' is unassociated with Waveface Station successfully. Please restart Waveface to continue assign a new Waveface Station user
WItem.zh-TW: Waveface Station已經成功的和 {0} 分離 請重新啟動程式後繼續指定Waveface Station使用者

WItem.en-US: Waveface Station is no longer available because '{0}' setup a new station or the account does not exist anymore. Please restart the program to initialize Waveface Station.
WItem.zh-TW: 無法使用Waveface Station, 因為{0}設定了另一個Waveface Station或是該帳號不存在 請重新啟動程式再次初始化Waveface Station

WItem.en-US: Unable to post. Please try again.
WItem.zh-TW: 無法張貼文章 請再試一次

WItem.en-US: Unable to deassociate user with Waveface Station. Please try again.
WItem.zh-TW: 無法分離使用者與Waveface station 請再試一次

WItem.en-US: There appears to be an error with the system. Please try again later.
WItem.zh-TW: 抱歉, 系統發生未預期錯誤, 請稍後再試.
抱歉! 您可以上傳的照片數已經超過系統允許值({0}).

WItem.en-US: Your authentication is expired. Re-enter your password to log in again.
WItem.zh-TW: 您的認證資訊已經過期, 請重新輸入密碼以便登入.

WItem.en-US: Do you really want to remove all files?
WItem.zh-TW: 你是否確定要移除所有檔案?

WItem.en-US: Do you really want to remove selected file(s)?
WItem.zh-TW: 你是否確定要移除所選取的檔案?

WItem.en-US: Uploading in progress: {0} files uploaded, {1} files remaining…
WItem.zh-TW: 檔案上傳中：{0}個檔案已上傳，剩下{1}個檔案

WItem.en-US: Uploading in progress: {0} files uploaded, {1} files remaining and {2} post waited…
WItem.zh-TW: 檔案上傳中：{0}個檔案已上傳，剩下{1}個檔案，和{2}篇貼文
